BearerAuth.description:
Provide your API key UUID in the 'Authorization' header prefixed with 'Bearer '.
Example: 'Authorization: Bearer 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

created_at.description: The date the team was created.

teams.description: A list of teams in the organization.

script_question.description: The question as provided during interview flow creation.

transcript_item_indices.description: A list of indices. The indices are the indices of the items in transcript_with_timestamp which are relevant to the script question. It includes the question asked by the agent as well as the user answers, but can also include follow up questions. The indices are often but not necessarily consecutive.

start_timestamp.description: The start timestamp of the section of the recording that is relevant to the script question.

end_timestamp.description: The end timestamp of the section of the recording that is relevant to the script question.

transcript_items.description: The items in transcript_with_timestamp which are relevant to the script question. For brevity, these items do not include a detailed list of words, but these can be accessed from transcript_with_timestamp by the transcript_item_indices

language_vocabulary_and_expression.description: Language vocabulary and expression score from the interview.

language_grammar_and_structure.description: Language grammar and structure score from the interview.

language_fluency_and_pace.description: Language fluency and pace score from the interview.

language_comprehension.description: Language comprehension score from the interview.

transcript_with_timestamp.description: Full transcript of the interview with word-level timestamps.

questions_to_transcript_mapping.description: A mapping of all the script questions to the actual interview transcript segments.

audio_url.description: Url to the interview audio recording.

video_url.description: Url to the interview video recording.

interview_flow_id.description: The ID of the interview flow.

team_id.description: The ID of the team this interview belongs to.

interview_data.description: Data for the completed interview. If the interview is incomplete, this field will be null.

success.description: Indicates successful deletion of interview recordings.

interviewee_email_address.description: The interviewee email address. This is used to identify the interviewee on the Ribbon platform. If not provided, this interview will not appear on the Ribbon platform

interview_id.description: The ID of the created interview.

interview_link.description: The single-use link to begin and conduct the interview.

interview_flow_id.description: The ID of the interview flow.

team_id.description: The ID of the team this interview flow belongs to.

org_name.description: The name of the organization requesting the interview.

questions.description: A list of questions to include in the interview.

voice_id.description: The voice ID to be used for the interview agent.

language.description: The language of the interview flow.

company_logo_url.description: Optional URL for the company's logo. If not provided, the Ribbon logo will be shown.

additional_info.description: Extra contextual information relevant to the interview. This can include background details, facts, or data points that the AI may use to enrich its questions or answers. For example: research focus, demographics or situational context.

additional_instructions.description: Guidelines on how the AI should behave during the interview. For example, adjust tone formality, avoid certain topics, or follow specific communication rules.

is_video_enabled.description: Whether the interview is video recorded or not.

is_doc_upload_enabled.description: Whether candidates can add resumes or other documents during the interview or not.

redirect_url.description: The URL where interviewee will be redirected after completing the interview. Make sure you're using the full URL, including https://

webhook_url.description: The URL that will be called after interview processing is complete. The payload will contain interview_flow_id, interview_id, and status.

webhook_secret_key.description: A secret key used to sign webhook payloads. When set, an X-Ribbon-Signature header containing an HMAC-SHA256 signature will be included with each webhook request.

intro.description: Introductory text spoken by the AI interviewer at the beginning of the interview.

outro.description: Concluding text spoken by the AI interviewer at the end of the interview.

org_name.description: The name of the organization requesting the interview.

questions.description: A list of questions to include in the interview.

voice_id.description: The voice ID to be used for the interview agent.

language.description: The language of the interview flow.

company_logo_url.description: Optional URL for the company's logo. If not provided, the Ribbon logo will be shown.

additional_info.description: Extra contextual information relevant to the interview. This can include background details, facts, or data points that the AI may use to enrich its questions or answers. For example: research focus, demographics or situational context.

additional_instructions.description: Guidelines on how the AI should behave during the interview. For example, adjust tone formality, avoid certain topics, or follow specific communication rules.

is_video_enabled.description: Whether the interview is video recorded or not.

is_doc_upload_enabled.description: Whether candidates can add resumes or other documents during the interview or not.

redirect_url.description: The URL where interviewee will be redirected after completing the interview. Make sure you're using the full URL, including https://

webhook_url.description: The URL that will be called after interview processing is complete. The payload will contain interview_flow_id, interview_id, and status.

webhook_secret_key.description: A secret key used to sign webhook payloads. When set, an X-Ribbon-Signature header containing an HMAC-SHA256 signature will be included with each webhook request.

intro.description: Introductory text spoken by the AI interviewer at the beginning of the interview.

outro.description: Concluding text spoken by the AI interviewer at the end of the interview.

team_id.description: The team ID to create the interview flow for. If not provided, defaults to the oldest team in the organization.

interview_flow_id.description: The ID of the interview flow.

get.description: Retrieve all teams in the organization.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of interviews to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset for the list of interviews.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the interviews to return.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: Filter interviews by team ID. If not provided, returns interviews for all teams in the organization.

403.description: The team_id does not belong to authenticated organization.

get.description: Retrieve all interview sessions. If team_id is not provided, returns interviews for all teams in the organization.

422.description: No interview flow found with provided interview_flow_id.

403.description: The interview flow found does not belong to authenticated organization.

post.description: Create an interview session. The interview will be created in the same team as the interview flow.

422.description: No interview found with provided interview_session_id.

403.description: The interview found does not belong to authenticated organization.

parameters.name: interview_id
parameters.description: The ID of the interview whose recordings should be deleted.

422.description: No interview found with provided interview_id.

500.description: Internal server error occurred while deleting interview recordings.

403.description: The interview found does not belong to authenticated organization.

delete.description: Revoke access to video and audio recordings for an interview.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of interview flows to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset for the list of interview flows.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: Filter interview flows by team ID. If not provided, returns interview flows for all teams in the organization.

403.description: The team_id does not belong to authenticated organization.

get.description: Retrieve all interview flows. If team_id is not provided, returns interview flows for all teams in the organization.

422.description: Unable to use file provided for company_logo_url, please provide valid url, supported image types are image/jpeg and image/png. Or no teams found in organization.

403.description: The team_id does not belong to authenticated organization.

post.description: Create an interview flow. If team_id is not provided, defaults to the oldest team in the organization.

parameters.name: interview_flow_id
parameters.description: The ID of the interview flow.

422.description: No interview flow found with provided interview_flow_id.

403.description: The interview flow found does not belong to authenticated organization.
